item.title: Aspose.Note for .NET 19.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Note for .NET 19.11. item.title: Aspose.Note for .NET 19.3 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Note for .NET 19.3. item.title: Aspose.Note for .NET 19.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Note for .NET 19.1. Features and Improvements Key Summary Category NOTENET-2712 Refactor rendering of underlined text for PDF format to improve quality Enhancement NOTENET-2713 Refactor rendering to PDF to improve performance Enhancement NOTENET-2548 Image is not visible in Chrome browser Bug Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes The following public types were added: Description Aspose.
